title: I am new to the stock market? How do I start? Are there any books I should read before I start to trade? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A, Zerodha varsity is a great one to begin with. It discusses various aspects, fundamentals and methodologies connected with stock market. It doesn't restrict with equities, besides currency, futures, fundamentals and technicals etc has been addressed in a simplified manner..
